mapper.select: SELECT A.prd_cd, A.dstn_cd, A.cmn_cd_thm, A.prd_nm, A.prd_dtl_desc, A.trv_per, A.prd_str_prc, A.dpr_str_date, A.dpr_fin_date, A.evnt_yn, A.fin_yn, A.act_yn, A.dc_yn, A.pc_prc, A.vcnt, A.lk_yn, B.img_pth, B.mn_img_yn, C.prd_dtl_cd, C.arl_nm, C.dpr_yn, C.rsvt_yn FROM trv_prd A JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd JOIN trv_prd_dtl C ON A.prd_cd = C.prd_cd WHERE act_yn=1

SELECT DISTINCT A.prd_cd, A.dstn_cd, A.cmn_cd_thm, A.prd_nm, A.prd_dtl_desc, A.trv_per, A.prd_str_prc, A.dpr_str_date, A.dpr_fin_date, A.evnt_yn, A.fin_yn, A.act_yn, A.dc_yn, A.pc_prc, A.vcnt, A.lk_yn, B.img_pth, B.mn_img_yn, C.prd_dtl_cd, C.arl_nm, C.dpr_yn, C.rsvt_yn, D.nt_cd_nm FROM trv_prd A JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd JOIN trv_prd_dtl C ON A.prd_cd = C.prd_cd JOIN dstn_ctg D ON A.cntn_cd = D.cntn_cd WHERE act_yn=1 and A.cntn_cd = #{cntn_cd} and A.nt_cd = #{nt_cd} and D.nt_cd_nm = #{nt_cd_nm}
